text:
About this one guy

-Never seen him angry(even get angry will watch the tone)

-Ringan tulang like literally he never said no if asked any favour

-Never had complain about anything even if workload alot.

-soft spoken

-pray 5 time a day

This kinda guy is a rare specimen
